General.Name: Bhartiya International Limited
General.Description: Bhartiya International Ltd. manufactures, trades in, and sells leather and textile products in India. It offers leather outerwear, bags and accessories, belts, wallets, and other small leather goods, as well as textile appeal, leather finishing, and design studio services. The company also engages in the development of real estate, IT and industrial park, retail spaces, interior solutions, and hotel and convention center. In addition, it exports its products. The company was incorporated in 1987 and is based in Gurugram, India.

1.Name: Mr. Amrishpal P. Singh Narag
1.Title: MD of J&J Leather Enterprises Ltd. and Director of Bhartiya International Sez Ltd.

5.Name: Mr. Govindan  Raghavan B.Sc, MMS
5.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of Bhartiya City Developers Private Limited
